name: Widget for Google Map
author: MhrTheme

sections.description: It will embed your google map into a widget area. You can add a widget in any of your widget areas and It will show your map.
sections.installation:
From the dashboard:

  1. Go to the WordPress Dashboard “Add New Plugin” section
  2. Search For “Widget for Google Map”
  3. Install, then Activate it

From the control panel:

  1. Unzip (if it is zipped) and Upload widget-for-google-map folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.faq:
Is there need anything to do with my theme?

No, you can not do anything, It will be work automatically with your widget area.

Does it work with any theme?

Absolutely! It will work with any theme where WordPress works.
